short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and reuse prompts for ChatGPT and Anthropic

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PromptBay helps you save, organize, and reuse your favorite ChatGPT and Anthropic prompts—no more losing track of great ideas. Assign headings for easy reference, copy prompts to your clipboard, and remove them when you’re done. Its simple, streamlined interface keeps your best prompts just a click away.
